import CartContext from "../../../context/cart-context" import { useContext } from "react" import classes from "./MealItem.module.css" import MealItemForm from "./MealItemForm" const MealItem=(props)=>{ useContext(CartContext) const addToCartHandler=(amount)=>{ } const price=`$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` return (

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) } export default MealItem
